0.text:
Innate - Accelerando: Sona generates a stack of Accelerando each time she hits an enemy  champion with  Hymn of Valor and each time she mitigates sufficient damage or heals damaged allies with  Aria of Perseverance, which stacks up to 120 times. If she has maximum stacks, she instead  reduces the cooldown of  Crescendo by 1.5 seconds each time.
 Accelerando: For each stack, Sona gains  0.5 basic ability haste, up to a maximum of 60.
0.html:
Innate - Accelerando: Sona generates a stack of Accelerando each time she hits an enemy champion with Hymn of Valor and each time she mitigates sufficient damage or heals damaged allies with Aria of Perseverance, which stacks up to 120 times. If she has maximum stacks, she instead  reduces the cooldown of Crescendo by 1.5 seconds each time.

Accelerando: For each stack, Sona gains  0.5 basic ability haste, up to a maximum of 60.
markedPassages: champion
Hymn of Valor
Aria of Perseverance
reduces
Crescendo
0.5

1.text: Innate - Melody: Sona's basic abilities incur  0.5-second global cooldown on her other basic abilities, and cause her to generate a unique aura for 3 seconds that empowers herself and nearby allied champions.
1.html: Innate - Melody: Sona's basic abilities incur  0.5-second global cooldown on her other basic abilities, and cause her to generate a unique aura for 3 seconds that empowers herself and nearby allied champions.
markedPassages: 0.5-second

2.text: Innate - Power Chord: Sona's basic abilities generate a stack of Power Chord, which stacks up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, her next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to have an  uncancellable windup, deal 20 − 240 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage, and apply an additional effect based on the last basic ability cast.
2.html: Innate - Power Chord: Sona's basic abilities generate a stack of Power Chord, which stacks up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, her next basic attack is empowered to consume them all to have an uncancellable windup, deal 20 − 240 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage, and apply an additional effect based on the last basic ability cast.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup
20 − 240 (based on level)

3.text: Gaining Power Chord's empowered attack  resets Sona's basic attack timer.
3.html: Gaining Power Chord's empowered attack resets Sona's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets

0.text: Active: Sona sends out bolts of sound to the two nearest visible enemies, prioritizing champions, that each deal magic damage and granting  sight of the area around them for 1 second. She gains a stack of  Accelerando for each bolt that hits an enemy  champion.
0.html: Active: Sona sends out bolts of sound to the two nearest visible enemies, prioritizing champions, that each deal magic damage and granting sight of the area around them for 1 second. She gains a stack of Accelerando for each bolt that hits an enemy champion.
markedPassages: sight
Accelerando
champion

1.text: Melody Bonus: Sona and tagged allied champions deal bonus magic damage on their next basic attack within 5 seconds.
1.html: Melody Bonus: Sona and tagged allied champions deal bonus magic damage on their next basic attack within 5 seconds.

2.text: Power Chord – Staccato: Power Chord deals 28 − 336 (based on level) (+ 28% AP) total magic damage.
2.html: Power Chord – Staccato: Power Chord deals 28 − 336 (based on level) (+ 28% AP) total magic damage.
markedPassages: Power Chord
28 − 336 (based on level)

0.text: Active: Sona  heals herself and sends out a tone to heal the most wounded allied champion nearby.
0.html: Active: Sona heals herself and sends out a tone to heal the most wounded allied champion nearby.
markedPassages: heals

1.text: Melody Bonus: Sona and tagged allied champions receive a  shield lasting up to 1.5 seconds.
1.html: Melody Bonus: Sona and tagged allied champions receive a shield lasting up to 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: shield

2.text: Sona gains a stack of  Accelerando whenever she  heals a wounded ally or  shields a minimum amount of damage for an ally with Aria of Perseverance.
2.html: Sona gains a stack of Accelerando whenever she heals a wounded ally or shields a minimum amount of damage for an ally with Aria of Perseverance.
markedPassages: Accelerando
heals
shields

3.text: Power Chord – Diminuendo: Power Chord reduces the target's size by 8% and damage output by 25% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 3 seconds.
3.html: Power Chord – Diminuendo: Power Chord reduces the target's size by 8% and damage output by 25% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 3 seconds.
markedPassages: Power Chord

0.text: Active: Sona gains 20% (+ 2% per 100 AP)  bonus movement speed for 3 seconds, which is extended to up to 7 seconds if she does not take damage during this time.
0.html: Active: Sona gains 20% (+ 2% per 100 AP)  bonus movement speed for 3 seconds, which is extended to up to 7 seconds if she does not take damage during this time.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed

1.text: Melody Bonus: Tagged allied champions gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.
1.html: Melody Bonus: Tagged allied champions gain bonus movement speed for 3 seconds.

2.text: Power Chord – Tempo: Power Chord  slows the target by 40% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 2 seconds, capped at a maximum of 99%.
2.html: Power Chord – Tempo: Power Chord slows the target by 40% (+ 4% per 100 AP) for 2 seconds, capped at a maximum of 99%.
markedPassages: Power Chord
slows

0.text: Active: Sona strikes an irresistible chord in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit, which  stuns and forces them to dance for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Sona strikes an irresistible chord in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit, which stuns and forces them to dance for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: stuns

If she has maximum stacks, she instead  reduces the cooldown of  Crescendo by 1.5 seconds each time.
 Accelerando: For each stack, Sona gains  0.5 basic ability haste, up to a maximum of 60.
